params.name: tokenizer
params.description: The tokenizer used for encoding the data.

params.name: padding
params.description: Select a strategy to pad the returned sequences according to the models padding side and padding indexamong:True or longest: Pad to the longest sequence in the batch (or no padding if only a single sequenceis provided).max_length: Pad to a maximum length specified with the argument max_length or to the maximumacceptable input length for the model if that argument is not provided.False or do_not_pad (default): No padding (i.e., can output a batch with sequences of differentlengths).

params.name: max_length
params.description: Maximum length of the returned list and optionally padding length (see above).

params.name: pad_to_multiple_of
params.description: Pad the sequence to a multiple of the provided value.This is especially useful to enable the use of Tensor Cores on NVIDIA hardware with compute capability >=7.5 (Volta).

params.name: return_tensors
params.description: The type of Tensor to return. Allowable values are np, pt and tf.
